list.name: Changes
list.comment:
Implement visual combat system and adjust player positioning
1). Added ImagePanels for Player and Enemy to GameScreenPanel 2). Updated GameLogic to toggle combat visuals and load specific enemy assets 3). Implemented automatic formatting for enemy filenames (e.g. "Wild Boar" -> "wild_boar") 4). Adjusted player sprite Y-coordinate to avoid UI overlap

task.summary: 1) Implemented fullscreen mode with dynamic UI scaling 2) Added settings menu with ESC key support 3) Music and SFX volume controls with logarithmic scaling 4) Fixed memory leaks in SoundManager with proper resource cleanup 5) Optimized code organization with constants and better error handling 6) Centered title and fixed About Us text display 7) Added animated loading screen with "Loading..." dots 8) Removed mute button (replaced by settings menu) 9) Fixed volume slider artifacts and improved UI consistency 10) Enhanced all panels for proper fullscreen scaling

MESSAGE.value:
Merge remote-tracking branch 'origin/master'
# Conflicts: # .idea/workspace.xml # src/AboutUsScreenPanel.java # src/Game.java # src/LoadingScreenPanel.java # src/MainMenuPanel.java # src/SoundManager.java # src/UIHelper.java
